thread.title: Here’s The First Teaser Trailer For The New Season HBO’s ‘Silicon Valley’
thread.title_full: Here’s The First Teaser Trailer For The New Season HBO’s ‘Silicon Valley’

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Here’s The First Teaser Trailer For The New Season HBO’s ‘Silicon Valley’
text:
HBO’s Silicon Valley is easily one of the best comedies on television. Erlich Bachman is a douchebag who brings piss to a shit fight. Gilfoyle is the entire embodiment of Geek Squad. Russ Hanneman is the best tech douchebag on TV. Richard definitely fucks.
The new season starts on April 23 with Pied Piper in the most tumultuous part of it’s existence. By the looks of the first teaser trailer, the gang is going to go its separate ways while Richard tries to make the “new Internet” — lol.
Peep the first trailer above.
